question: Larsen & Toubro has commissioned the 360 MW Bheramara power plant in __________.
explanation: Engineering major Larsen & Toubro has commissioned the 360 MW Bheramara power plant in Bangladesh. The Bheramara Combined Cycle Power Plant Development project was handed over to North West Power Generation Company Ltd (NWPGCL), a fully-owned subsidiary of Bangladesh Power Development Board (BPDB). The power plant is based in Bheramara of Kushtia district in Bangladesh.
